'''Philanemo Mushrooms''' are a [[Local Specialty]] found in residential areas of [[Mondstadt]].

==How to Obtain==
Philanemo mushrooms grow on walls and roofs of buildings, and more rarely on tree trunks, in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Springvale]] and [[Dawn Winery]].

For specific locations, see the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?bbs_presentation_style=no_header&lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=39&center=-111.96,-200.87&zoom=-1.00 Official Interactive Map].

Additionally, the following NPCs give Philanemo Mushrooms after following certain dialogue branches for the first time:
*[[Michelle]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]] (6 Philanemo Mushrooms)

==Trivia==
* While Philanemo Mushrooms are not used in any in-game recipes, they are ingredients in-universe, as they are used in the preparation of the [[Special Mondstadt Hash Brown]] received during [[Sorry, Timmie!]].
* The following birthday mails included Philanemo Mushrooms:
** [[Mail/How Does One Celebrate a Birthday? (2021-03-14)|Jean's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Philanemo Mushrooms)
